titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: DIAGNOSIS (SNOMED CT ON ADMISSION TO NEONATAL CRITICAL CARE) - Description

div.p: DIAGNOSIS (SNOMED CT ON ADMISSION TO NEONATAL CRITICAL CARE) is the same as attribute CLINICAL TERMINOLOGY CODE.
DIAGNOSIS (SNOMED CT ON ADMISSION TO NEONATAL CRITICAL CARE) is the SNOMED CT ® concept ID describing a PATIENT DIAGNOSIS for the baby on admission to neonatal critical care.
